meanings.definition: The quality of being appropriate or suitable for a particular season.
meanings.sent1: The seasonableness of the decorations made the party feel festive.
meanings.sent2: I love the seasonableness of wearing cozy sweaters in the fall.
meanings.sent3: The seasonableness of wearing a swimsuit in the snow would be quite comical.
meanings.sent4: Her outfit had the seasonableness of a blooming flower in spring.
meanings.sent5: The seasonableness of the pumpkin spice latte made it the perfect drink for autumn.

meanings.definition: The state of being in accordance with the time of year.
meanings.sent1: The garden's seasonableness was evident in the colorful blooms of summer.
meanings.sent2: His wardrobe reflected the seasonableness of each month with different styles.
meanings.sent3: The seasonableness of wearing a swimsuit in the snow would be quite amusing.
meanings.sent4: The town's decorations had the seasonableness of a clock ticking through the year.
meanings.sent5: The seasonableness of the falling leaves painted a beautiful picture of autumn.

meanings.definition: The condition of being timely or opportune.
meanings.sent1: The seasonableness of his arrival at the meeting saved the day.
meanings.sent2: Her advice came with the seasonableness of a well-timed clock.
meanings.sent3: The seasonableness of bringing an umbrella on a sunny day would be quite funny.
meanings.sent4: His jokes had the seasonableness of a perfectly timed punchline.
meanings.sent5: The seasonableness of the discount made it the perfect time to buy a new coat.
